headline: United Airlines: Why I Sold My Shares (Rating Downgrade)
summary: United Airlines' P/E ratio of 10x prompted a cautious sell. Read why UAL stock's future upside may be uncertain amid industry volatility and fading tailwinds.

headline: United Airlines Holdings Inc. (NASDAQ:UAL): From Sore to Soar
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on United Airlines Holdings Inc. (NASDAQ:UAL) on ValueInvestorsClub by sondasy. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on UAL. The company’s shares were trading at $58.00 when this thesis was published, vs. the closing price of $95.43 on Jan 02. UAL provides air transportation across the globe. […]

headline: United Airlines: Big 2025 Ahead
summary: United Airlines had a remarkable year, achieving a 138% return, and is poised for further gains with strong earnings and capital returns. Read the full stock report on Seeking Alpha.
